name: High Purifier Valdrek Ice-Blood
role: Leader of the Silver Hand — former Companion turned purifier

aspects.high_concept: Former Companion Who Now Hunts His Own Kind
aspects.trouble: Grief Over Kodlak's Perceived Betrayal Blinds Me
other_aspects: Ysgramor's Legacy Must Not Be Defiled
Silver Weapons for a Silver Cause

stunts: Purifier's Strike: +2 to Fight when attacking a werewolf or beastblooded target.
Silver-Honed Blade: Weapons treated as silver; werewolves cannot use lycanthropic regeneration when taken out by Valdrek.
I've Hunted Your Kind Before: Once per scene, reveal a weakness or secret about a beastblooded NPC or PC as a free Create Advantage.
Unbroken Conviction: +2 to Will when resisting compels or persuasion attempts that ask him to spare a lycanthrope.

equipment.armor: Studded Nord plate with Silver Hand heraldry
equipment.special: Silver throwing knives, wolfsbane potion, wanted notices for beastblooded targets

personality_notes.speaking_style: Measured and sorrowful. Quotes Ysgramor. Refers to werewolves as 'the corrupted.' Never gloats — he kills with grim duty, not pleasure.
motivations: Avenge what he sees as Kodlak Whitemane's betrayal of Ysgramor's ideals
Purge lycanthropy from Skyrim's warrior culture
Protect Sovngarde from being denied to Hircine's thralls
Restore the Companions to their pre-corruption glory
fears: That he himself was once tempted by the beast blood and refused
That his methods make him as monstrous as those he hunts
Dying before his purification mission is complete
quirks: Wears a wolf-tooth necklace taken from a Companion he killed — a reminder of the 'cost'
Recites lines from the Song of the Companions before battle
Will offer a clean death to beastblooded foes who renounce Hircine

trust_clock.description: Valdrek does not build trust — only hunt eligibility. Not tracked as a trust clock.

lore_notes: Valdrek was a Companion a generation ago who left when he learned of the beast blood. He believes Kodlak Whitemane's attempt to seek a cure was a sign of weakness, not redemption. Unknown to him, a Thalmor agent has been quietly funding his operations to destabilize Nord warrior culture.
combat_notes: Valdrek is a named boss encounter activated at Silver Hand escalation level 4+. He fights until severely wounded, then offers parley if the PC is not beastblooded. If beastblooded, he fights to the end.
